Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO HIGHER EDUCATION

Title: Relates to requiring a licensed massage therapist to display such licensed massage therapist's license when practicing and the required contents of such license
Summary: Relates to requiring a licensed massage therapist to display such licensed massage therapist's license when practicing and the required contents of such license, including at a minimum the licensee's name, license number and a non-removable photograph of such licensee.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to requiring a licensed massage therapist to display such licensed massage therapist's license when practicing and the required contents of such license
